string.text: Wanderer Autonomy
Allow clanless Wanderers to interact with lords and other wanderers
Hero Setup
Minimum Attraction
Attraction score required for NPCs to consider others as attractive
Logging Setup
Relationship Logs
Show relationship changes in the logs
friends with benefits
{HERO1.LINK} and {HERO2.LINK} are now {RELATIONSHIP}
Chance of Getting Caught
Chance of getting caught by partners while interacting with other heroes
You flirted with {HERO.LINK}. (Love {NUM})
You had a casual conversation with {HERO.LINK}. (Trust {NUM})
Show Only Clan Interaction
Show only interactions of your clan members in the chatlog
my lover
my love
my betrothed
my special friend
Excuse me, {TITLE}. I do not believe we have been introduced, but might I trouble you for a moment of your time?
{TITLE}, it is a pleasure to see you. May I humbly request a moment of your time?
Of course, {TITLE}. What is it you wish to discuss?
My apologies, {TITLE}, but I am short of time right now.
I am always eager to hear new stories. Tell me of your latest exploits while traveling in the realm.
There is a matter that has weighed upon my thoughts for some time. I would value hearing your opinion.
I must admit that I find you quite charming. It would be a shame to not grow better acquainted.
Would you care to walk with me? I should enjoy the company of one so striking.
I must confess, I cannot stop thinking of you. I have strong feelings for you, {TITLE}, and would see our bond grow deeper. What say you?
Your presence stirs my heart, {TITLE}. I should very much like to see you more often—just the two of us, away from prying eyes. What do you think, {TITLE}?
Ah, {TITLE}, I have missed you dearly. Might we share some time together?
I had been hoping to see you, {TITLE}. Shall we seek a quieter place for a more... private discussion?
It seems we are in luck, {TITLE}. {SPOUSE} is away and will not return soon. Will you join me?
At last, {SPOUSE} is gone, and we have some precious moments of privacy. Will you come to me, {TITLE}?
I shall speak plainly, {TITLE}. I have urgent 'needs' that must be met, and you strike me as one who values discretion. Might I rely on you?
This is most embarrassing, {TITLE}, but I find myself in need of, uh, 'relief'. Might you be willing to assist me and 'scratch the itch', as it were?
You are {TITLE} and I trust you. I wonder—might we aid one another in the matter of 'natural urges', perhaps on a regular basis?
I have been thinking, {TITLE}. I was wondering if you would be interested in helping one another. In terms of pleasure, to be blunt. What do you say?
I have been eagerly awaiting your company, {TITLE}. Shall we talk for a while—and perhaps later, engage in some... private diversions?
Ah, {TITLE}, I was hoping you might have time for conversation... and perhaps a study of human form thereafter. Are you intrigued?
{SPOUSE} is away, and I yearn for you, {TITLE}. Let us retire to the bedchamber and revel in our time together. Will you?
With {SPOUSE} is absent, the bed lies empty. It would be a shame to let it go to waste, would it not? Does this idea tempt you, {TITLE}?
Come to me and kiss me, {TITLE}. I have longed for your touch, and I can bear the wait no longer!
Set aside your garments, and I shall show you a different kind of battle—one fought in my bedchamber, where both sides emerge victorious.
I love you dearly, {TITLE}. The time has come to take the next step in our journey together. Will you marry me?
You have my heart, {TITLE}, and I know that no other shall ever take your place. Will you do me the honor of marriage?
Now that we are within a settlement, {TITLE}, let us seek an officiant and be wed at last. Shall we?
While we are in a settlement, {TITLE}, we should take this chance to formalize our union without delay, should we not?
Very well. Let us speak, then, {TITLE}.
You make quite the impression. But tell me, what else should I know of you?
Oh {TITLE}, I wish for the very same!
Sure, {TITLE}, I always enjoy your company.
Oh yes, {TITLE}. Let us savor our time while they remain away.
Do not trouble yourself, {TITLE}. I understand, and I shall gladly assist you.
An intriguing proposition, {TITLE}. I must admit, I do find it appealing.
Of course, {TITLE}. I welcome the diversion
Ah, the things we do for excitement... Lead on, {TITLE}!
As you wish. I promise you will not get much sleep, {TITLE}...
You bring my dreams to life, {TITLE}. Yes, I would love to marry you!
We are in a settlement, {TITLE}. Let us wed at once!
We are in agreement, {TITLE}. Let us seal our bond together.
I am sorry {TITLE}, but I have no interest in that right now.
You had a date with {HERO.LINK}. (Love {NUM}, Trust {NUM2})
You saw {HERO.LINK} having a date with {TARGET.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} saw you having a date with {TARGET.LINK}.
You were intimate with {HERO.LINK}...
You caught {HERO.LINK} being intimate with {TARGET.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} caught you being intimate with {TARGET.LINK}.
You got pregnant from {HERO.LINK}.
You impregnated {HERO.LINK}...
{HERO.LINK} was born!
You are engaged to {HERO.LINK}.
You and {HERO.LINK} are now friends.
You and {HERO.LINK} are now friends...with benefits.
You banished {HERO.LINK} from your clan!
{HERO.LINK} has left your clan.
Clan Changes Logs
Show clan changes in the logs
{HERO.LINK} has left {OLDCLAN}.
{HERO.LINK} was thrown out of {OLDCLAN} by {CAUSEDBY.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} joined {CLAN}.
You ended your relationship with {HERO.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} ended their relationship with you.
{HERO.LINK} married {TARGET.LINK}.
{TITLE}, may I occupy a few minutes of your time?
Let us talk about something else, {TITLE}.
Apologies, {TITLE}, but my spouse is around. We should not risk it.
Apologies, {TITLE}, but I will not do that right now.
I am sorry {TITLE}, but I am not ready for that step just yet.
Again? Give me some rest, {TITLE}. Let us talk about it later.
You are now the lover of {HERO.LINK}.
1: Hero Selection
Select Hero
2: Personality
Represents how willing a person is to try new things
Refers to an individual's desire to be careful and diligent
Measures how energetic, outgoing and confident a person is
Refers to how an individual interacts with others
Represents how much someone is inclined to experience negative emotions
3: Desire
Attraction To Men
Defines whether an individual finds male persons attractive or not
Attraction To Women
Defines whether an individual finds female persons attractive or not
Attraction To Weight
Defines whether an individual has interest in chubby or thin heroes
Attraction To Build
Defines whether an individual has interest in muscular or weak heroes
Attraction To Age Difference
Defines whether an individual has interest in older or younger heroes in year difference
Defines whether an individual generally develops interest in intercourse or not
Represents how willing a hero currently is for intercourse due to hormones
4: Relation to Target
Trust value to the player
Love value to the player
Tension value to the player
No Relationship
No relationship with the player
Has friendship with the player
Friend with benefits
Has friendship with benefits with the player
Is a couple with the player
Is engaged with the player
Is married with the player
Sexual orientation
Children Logs
Show birth, conceptions or orphanage events in the logs
{HERO1.LINK} was impregnated by {HERO2.LINK}!
{CHILD.LINK} was born to {HERO1.LINK} and {HERO2.LINK}.
Greetings, {TITLE}, you do not yet know me. I am {HERO} of the {CLAN}.
Good day, {TITLE}. It is fortunate that I have caught you.
It seems that you and {HERO} were...enjoying yourselves. Are you aware that they are {STATUS}?
Huh...so you and {HERO} were enjoying each other's company...in bed. You do know that they are {STATUS}, right?
So you have given birth to {CHILD}. It is no secret that the child's true father is {FATHER}, and not myself. Yet you are {STATUS}, are you not?
You wed {HERO} behind my back. Did it never occur to you to inform me? You are {STATUS}!
So you and {HERO} are now betrothed. Did you truly believe I would not learn of it?!
my spouse
my friend
my acquaintance
It is apparent that you and {HERO.LINK} often conduct 'private meetings'. Have you forgotten that you are {STATUS}?
So, {HERO} has been keeping you entertained in bed? You are {STATUS}, or has that slipped your mind?
{HERO} has given birth to {CHILD}, and it seems you are the father. I thought you were {STATUS}?
Relation loss with {HERO}. (Love {NUM}, Trust {NUM2})
I forgive you, {TITLE}. But mark my words—I shall not forget this.
I cannot accept this, {TITLE}. You are undeserving of anything more from me. Our relationship ends here.
This will not be forgotten, {TITLE}. Farewell.
Forget it, {TITLE}. Farewell.
Oh, {TITLE}, I love you! I beg you, do not act so rashly that you come to regret it...
Well, well, {TITLE}. What now?
As you wish, {TITLE}.
Pregnancy Duration
How many days is a hero pregnant before giving birth
Pregnancy Chance
Chance a hero gets pregnant (only for Dramalord pregnancies)
Minimum Dating Love
Love points required to consider dating a hero
Select hero from list (only works with running campaign)
Load Hero
Current Attraction
Current attraction value to player
Current Sympathy
Current sympathy value to player
Bonus Player Attraction
Bonus value for player's attraction to other heroes
Chance Approaching Player
Chance that heroes approach the player for conversations
You ended your friendship with {HERO.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} ended their friendship with you.
Minimum Marriage Love
Love points required for heroes to consider marrying another hero
Days Between Interactions
Number of days heroes can't interact with the same hero again
Is married to the player
Player Default Pregnancies
Allow default pregnancies for the player or their spouse
Player Always Witness
The player will always be witness of events
You saw {HERO.LINK} proposing to {TARGET.LINK}!
{HERO.LINK} saw you proposing to {TARGET.LINK}!
Bonus Player Sympathy
Bonus value for player's sympathy to other heroes
Show Friends With Benefits
Show friends with benefits on Encyclopedia page of a hero
Show Lovers
Show lovers on Encyclopedia page of a hero
Certainly! I am game for a good conversation.
Ah, you are bold, {TITLE}. I wonder, is your wit as sharp as your tongue? Let us find out.
You know, {TITLE}... I have dreamt of this moment since I first laid eyes on you.
Of course, {TITLE}. Let us spend some time together, just the two of us.
Show Betrotheds
Show betrotheds on Encyclopedia page of a hero
It pains me, {TITLE}, but I must put an end to our relationship.
Oh no, {TITLE}! My heart breaks, yet I know I have no choice but to accept your decision...
Well, I suppose it always comes to this in the end, does it not, {TITLE}? It was wonderful while it lasted. Truly, I thank you.
I do not know what to say. This has left me utterly distraught. I need some time to consider things.
Be gone from my sight, {NAME}. Gather your belongings and leave at once.
I will grant only one final chance, {TITLE}. If you mean to stay, then you must end things with {HERO}—there is no other way.
I have heard that you wed {HERO}. I assume they have neglected to inform you that they are, in fact, {STATUS}?
Congratulations to you and {HERO} on your engagement. I simply thought you should know that they are {STATUS}.
Player Clan Autonomy
Allow heroes of your clan to interact with lords and other wanderers
Not today, {TITLE}. I am in no mood. Ask me another time.
Allow Incest
Allow AI to approach family members for intimate and emotional events
Player Conversation Cooldown
Number of days heroes can't interact with the player after speaking to them
Allow Same Sex Marriage
Allow AI to marry other heroes of the same sex (otherwise they are just lovers)
Allow Interaction In Army
Allow AI to interact with each other while being in armies
{HERO1.LINK} put child {CHILD.LINK} into an orphanage.
{HERO1.LINK} adopted orphan {CHILD.LINK}.
Good day, {TITLE}. How can I help you?
I would like to extend my family and adopt an orphan.
I want to be rid of a child in my clan.
Oh, that is great {TITLE}! We have currently {BOYS} boys and {GIRLS} girls in our orphanage.
I am truly sorry {TITLE}, but you have to be married in order to adopt a child. Such is the law of our land to ensure that these children will be taken care of.
My apologies {TITLE}, but there are currently no children in our orphanage.
I would like to adopt a boy.
I would like to adopt a girl.
Who would you like to adopt?
{ORPHAN.NAME}, {ORPHANAGE} years old.
I am thinking of a different child.
Very well. Are you absolutely sure you want to adopt {ORPHAN.NAME}?
Congratulations! I am sure {ORPHAN.NAME} will be in good hands.
Oh well, that's sad. {ORPHAN.NAME} will be very disappointed.
Of course {TITLE}, we can arrange that.
{TITLE}, it appears that there are no children in your clan.
Who would be the unfortunate child that we should take into our custody?
Very well. Are you absolutely sure you want to give away {ORPHAN.NAME}?
Then it is decided. We will take care of {ORPHAN.NAME} and find a new home for the child. Please bid your farewells and leave their belongings with us.
Very well, {TITLE}. {ORPHAN.NAME} will stay in your clan.
Prisoner, I would have a word with you.
It is not as if I have much of a choice, is it {TITLE}.
I have no interest in conversing with the likes of you. Begone!
I might be persuaded to release you from your bonds. In exchange for 'services' in my bedroom.
It is time to end this. Your existence is a nuisance.
Truly? Well, I suppose I have little choice but to agree to your terms. I may as well at least try to enjoy it...
How dare you attempt to stain my honor with such a proposition! You disgust me! I would never.
Do what you must then, you vile and honorless swine!
Oh Lord, no! Please—I beg of you!
Wait, {TITLE}! Please stay your hand. Why choose death over... pleasure?
Hmm. Alright, I accept. But know that you will only be spared if you performance is satisfactory.
Unfortunately for you, nothing could grant me greater pleasure than your death.
{HERO1.LINK} released their captive {HERO2.LINK} in exchange for their 'special services'...
Visit Orphanage
Visit the orphanage to adopt a child or get rid of one from your clan
Love Gain Multiplier
Love gained due to flirting or dates is multiplied by this value
Trust Gain Multiplier
Trust gained due to talking or dates is multiplied by this value
{TITLE}, allow me to give you this exceptional {GIFT} as a token of my affection.
Oh, thank you, {TITLE}! I shall keep it at my bedside as a reminder of your...affections. I intend to make much use of it!
You gave {HERO.LINK} a {TOY}.
Toy Break Chance
Chance a toy can break while being used by a hero.
{HERO.LINK}s toy broke!
Global Default Pregnancies.
Allow default pregnancies for all npcs
Global Default Marriages.
Allow default marriages for all npcs
{HERO.LINK} is disappointed in you, for you have failed to fulfill their urgent request...
{HERO.LINK} seeks your presence regarding a matter of great urgency. Will you arrive in time?
{QUESTHERO} requests your presence.
{HERO.LINK} is pleased that you have seen their request through to completion...
Oh, {TITLE}, you have finally come! I was desperately awaiting your arrival!
Ah, look who it is. You have finally decided that I am worthy of your time then, {TITLE}?
Here I am. What is this issue of urgency that requires my attention?
Oh, I fear the matter is most dire indeed! Cast aside your garments, {TITLE}, and follow me at once. Your expertise is required in a most delicate affair!
Alas, {TITLE}, you have tarried too long. Another has already seen to my... predicament. Your services are no longer required. Farewell.
Quest Chance
Chance that a lover of the player starts a quest
Show Relation Changes
Enable this if you want to see relation change notifications (required for the Small Talk mod)
Show Captivity Logs
Enable this if you want to see logs when heroes are captured
{TITLE}, I am curious—might you share what qualities you favor in a partner? (Information)
Forgive me, {TITLE}, but I do not trust you well enough to discuss this with you.
Certainly, {TITLE}. If you truly wish to know, I shall tell you...
I find myself primarily drawn to those of the opposite sex. As the saying goes, opposites attract.
I am most inclined toward those of my own sex. As they say, birds of a feather flock together.
I am captivated by both men and women alike, for I see beauty in both.
I do not feel particularly drawn to either sex, truthfully.
I find that slender figures possess a certain elegance.
I prefer a balance—not too thin, nor too large. A form that is just right.
I favor those of a fuller figure—more to hold, more to enjoy.
I tend towards those who are lean. Sometimes less is more.
A well-toned body suits me best—Althletic, maybe, but nothing excessive. Somewhere in the middle.
I am quite fond of strong, muscular figures. The more imposing, the better.
I am drawn to those who are {AGEDIFF} than myself. I prefer partners around the age of {AGE}.
As for you {TITLE}, I think you are probably a... {RATING} out of 100.
neither older nor younger
You learned the physical preferences of {HERO.LINK}.
Minimum Trust Friends
Trust points required to consider a hero a friend (Dramalord friend only)
It may do us well to share our thoughts. Care to talk? (Friendly chat)
You look stunning, {TITLE}, though I suspect you are already well aware... (Flirting)
I must confess I have feelings for you, {TITLE}! (Love affair)
There is nothing I desire more than to be with you, and you alone. (Dating)
Do you yearn for pleasure as I do, {TITLE}? (Friend with benefits)
I want you, and I know you feel the same. Come away with me somewhere more private. (Intimacy)
I crave your touch, {TITLE}. Will you grant me this indulgence? (Intimacy)
I love you dearly, {TITLE}. There is no road that I wish to walk without you. Will you marry me? (Betrothed)
Now that we are in a settlement, {TITLE}, let us seek an officiant and finally be wed! (Marriage)
This is not working, {TITLE}. Let us put an end to this charade before it turns to bitterness. (Break up)
Thank you for the conversation, {TITLE}.
Tell me, {TITLE}, as you travel wide and meet many, do you have an opinion of {POI.NAME}?
Ah, {POI.NAME}! Yes, we have met. I am actually quite fond of them.
Unfortunately, yes. I have met {POI.NAME} and do not regard them kindly.
{POI.NAME}, you say? I harbor no feelings for them one way or the other.
Oh, {POI.NAME}? We have yet to meet, but I hope to, and have heard good things.
From what I have heard, I have been spared a misfortune in not having met {POI.NAME}.
I hold no opinion of {POI.NAME}, as we have yet to exchange words.
That is good to hear! {POI.NAME} is a fine person to know.
That is most unfortunate. {POI.NAME} and I get along quite well.
Oh? That is a pity. {POI.NAME} is someone I have always thought well of.
Hmph. You admire {POI.NAME}? How very disappointing.
I completely agree! {POI.NAME} left a very poor impression on me.
Well, I do not care for {POI.NAME} much at all.
You seem quick to form an opinion about {POI.NAME}, I have to say.
I do not harbor an opinion about {POI.NAME}, either. I do not yet know them well enough.
That is an excellent point of view! Agreed.
Well, I am afraid I must disagree with you on that.
Hm. You seem to be quite opinionated.

I heard tale of a warrior that was executed for renouncing his oaths and turning to banditry, but it is said that he did it to feed the hungry. Did his ends justify his means? What do you think? (Honor)
There is always another way, even if it presents great difficulty. One should not compromise their honor.
Having a code is almost as important as knowing when to break it.
People starve, people steal, and people die. It is just the way of things.
I recently heard a story about a great commander who won a difficult victory against impossible odds. Would you still go to battle if you knew the odds were against you? (Valor)
Yes, I would. Sometimes it is more important to fight than to be victorious. The world belongs to the brave.
No. Why would I risk my life when I am certain to lose? That would be foolish.
Hm. I cannot say. I think that it would depend on the situation.
I have heard that some lords allow defeated foes to leave the battlefield unharmed. Some think it admirable, others deem it a dangerous folly. What do you think? (Mercy)
They allowed them to go home to their families. I would do the same.
Off with their heads, I say! That would make it difficult for them to march to battle again.
It is the nature of war—some live, some do not. That is just the way of things.?
Recently, I heard tale told of an arena champion who gave all of his tournament winnings away to the poor. (Generosity)
That is quite the act of generosity. People such as that are a rarity, unfortunately.
Bah! What a waste. What is the point of gold and glory if not to keep it?
Well, I suppose that it is their money, thus it is their choice.
I heard that a noble clan nearly turned against their own king after being denied a request. Some call it reckless, others see it as a bold gambit. What do you think? (Calculating)
That was a rash decision. One should not throw away power over a fleeting insult.
I can understand the urge. Sometimes you must act on your convictions, consequences be damned.
Difficult to say. Life is complicated, and I can hardly judge such things.
Oh, you are making me blush! I am delighted to hear that.
Does that mean you do not consider me to be attractive?
You truly do not have any preference? Hm.
Do you prefer the company of those alike to yourself, or do you find charm in a more opposite sort? (Orientation)
I do not possess any particular preference.
I overheard a debate at the tavern—some were saying they enjoy a fuller figure, while others prefer a leaner form. What do you think? (Weight)
Many people admire a strong and powerful form. Others like the slender and agile. Where do your tastes lie? (Build)
Some are known to rob the cradle, others are known to rob the grave. What about you? (Age)
I tend towards people older than myself. They say that wine grows better with age.
I enjoy the company of people younger than myself. I find their energy invigorating.
I usually enjoy being around people near to my own age.
I have heard it said that the world belongs to those willing to embrace change. What do you think? (Openness)
Novel experiences bring life its color. I welcome change.
I see no need to meddle with what already works. A steady routine serves me well.
Change happens, whether we welcome it or not. I simply take things as they come.
Tell me, do you find comfort in careful planning, or do you prefer to take life as it comes? (Conscientiousness)
Order and structure are the foundation of success. A good plan is everything.
Plans? No, not really. I usually follow the road where it takes me.
Sometimes I plan, sometimes I do not. It depends on the day.
Feasts bring together all sorts—lords, merchants, poets, and travelers. Some relish the company, while others prefer a quiet corner. What about you? (Extroversion)
Oh, absolutely! I thrive in good company. The more people, the better!
I prefer to keep to myself. Large crowds can be exhausting.
Well, I suppose that depends. I enjoy company, but too much can be overwhelming.
When a friend confides in you about something that weighs heavily on their heart. Do you offer comfort, or is it best they handle it on their own? (Agreeableness)
Of course, I try to comfort them. If I can help, I will.
Truthfully, I am not always the best person for that. People must learn to handle their own troubles.
I suppose that it depends on my mood and the situation.
The burdens of leadership can weigh heavily on the mind. Some struggle under the pressure, while others thrive in it. How do you manage? (Neuroticism)
Oh, the stress can be unbearable at times. When it becomes too much, I shut myself away for days.
Stress? I hardly notice it. I find I rather enjoy the challenge.
I manage well enough, though I do take time to rest when needed.
Minimum Trust FWB
Trust points required to consider a hero being a friend with benefits
I feel uncertain about this. I do care for you, but is it enough?
If we never try, we will never know what might have been.
You are overthinking this. Trust your heart.
I truly believe that we could build something lasting, if we choose to.
I would be honored if you would have me.
This is all so overwhelming... I love you, {PLAYER.NAME}, but are we truly ready?
Love is a journey, and I would see where this road leads us.
This feels right. There is nowhere else for us to go but forward.
At last, we could share everything with each other.
In truth, this is the only honorable course before us.
This is quite the scandalous suggestion... What if feelings become entangled?
What is passion without a little risk?
Then we shall face whatever comes, together.
Just imagine the pleasure we could share...
Then we release each other and return to what was before.
Uhh... well...
You successfully convinced {HERO.LINK}. (Love {LOVE}, Trust {TRUST})
You failed to convince {HERO.LINK}. (Love {LOVE}, Trust {TRUST})
{TITLE}, I wish your family to enter nobility and join our clan as true members
It would be an honor, {TITLE}. In the name of my family I accept with gratitude!
I am sorry, {TITLE}. Not all members of my family would feel comfortable enough for this step. This could tore my family apart.
Thank you for the offer, {TITLE}. But this is for the eldest members of my family to decide.
{NAME} has a broad and heavyset physique.
{NAME} has a broad but lean physique.
{NAME} has a soft but heavyset physique.
{NAME} has a slender and lean physique.
{NAME} has a slender physique.
{NAME} has a lean physique.
My childhood was not easy. I grew up an urchin on the streets, cared for by the local gang.
The leader fed us scarcely and would send us off to rob and steal. If we we could not bring home enough spoils by end of day, we were beaten.
As soon as I grew teats I was sent to the tavern. I had to entertain disgusting men and make them spend their money on drinks.. or on me.
Once there was an old, nasty, orange faced noble man who constantly grabbed at me without paying. So I promptly kicked him in the groin and fled the city.
Anyway, I figured that it was better to stab than be 'stabbed', so to speak. So, I made it my new business.
As soon as I had a single hair upon my chest I was sent off to the castles as a servant for elderly ladies. I would 'entertain' them while their husbands were off at war.
One night, while 'planting seeds' in the 'old silver forest', the heart of the, uh, 'woodsman' seemed to simply stop. I panicked, thinking that I would be found to blame. So I fled.
My time , switched to sword and axe instead. Turns out I am quite good with that too.
Lord Stickyfinger did not deserve any better I suppose.
Ouch! That's quite the punishment.
It must have been hard being a young buck in old forests.
Well, young timber hardly belongs in ancient forests, does it?
I wish to acquire certain goods...
Alright. What are you interested in?
Something long, rounded that can withstand confrontations with moist environments.
Something soft and moist that you can stick your finger into multiple times.
I can sell you a {GOOD} or more if you want.
One will do.
Five should suffice.
I would need at least ten.
No problem! That would be {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} for you. Special price of course.
Nice doing business with you.
No Dialogs For Player
Enable this if you want dialogs but an auto result when talking/flirting/dating.
You are now more attractive to {HERO.LINK}. ({NUMBER})
You are now less attractive to {HERO.LINK}. ({NUMBER})
{HERO.LINK} has more sympathy for you. ({NUMBER})
{HERO.LINK} has less sympathy for you. ({NUMBER})
{HERO1.LINK} and {HERO2.LINK} are no longer {RELATIONSHIP}
Love Decay Start Day
Number of days lovers haven't seen each other needed to make love decay.
Oh, hello {TITLE}. I... didn't expect you...
{HERO1.LINK} was intimate with {HERO2.LINK}.
Intimate Logs
Show intimate events in the logs
Allow Clans Changing Kingdoms
Allow AI clans to switch kingdoms on defeat or marriage
{CLAN} joined {KINGDOM}.
{CLAN} has left {KINGDOM}.
Player Spouse Faithful
The spouse of the player will not interact with anyone else
{HERO} will leave {FACTION} within one day.
You have shown that you do not belong in this clan. Gather your things and leave at once.
There is no place for your clan in my kingdom. Depart now, and do not return!
So, this is what our friendship amounts to in the end? What a disappointment. Very well, I will do as you ask.
Keep Children in Clans
Non legitimate children born into clans will not end up in the orphanage
I want you to get rid of our unborn child.
I want you to get rid of the unborn child of you and {HERO}.
I do not want to give birth to our child.
Include Notables
Include Notables like Gang leaders in Dramalord AI (experimental, performance impact)
If you consider this necessary, then I will take care of it {TITLE}.
I will not accept this, {TITLE}. I urge you to reconsider, or there will be consequences!
If that is your wish, then so be it {TITLE}. I cannot force you to keep it.
Are you insane, {TITLE}? This child is the manifestation of our love!
You are right. It would not be proper to give birth to a child of {HERO}.
I cannot, {TITLE}! This child is the result of the love I have for {HERO}!

{HERO.LINK} saw you getting married to {OTHER.LINK}.
You witnessed {HERO.LINK} getting married to {OTHER.LINK}.
Have you heard? {HERO} and {OTHER} are to be wed—who would have thought, after all those whispers about their courtly dalliances?
Did you hear? {HERO} and {OTHER} are now husband and wife—though with all that has been said, one wonders if vows alone will silence the rumors.
Word travels fast—{HERO} and {OTHER} have been meeting in secret, though if they wish to remain unnoticed, they should be less obvious with their stolen glances.
Well, the whole castle is aflutter! {HERO} and {OTHER} were found abed together, and not even the dawn could wash away the scandal.
Whispers abound—{HERO} and {OTHER} have welcomed a child, though some say the timing is rather... convenient.
In your absence, it seems that {OTHER} saw to {HERO} and their 'needs'.
Pay no mind to the chatter, {TITLE}. It is but idle gossip, and soon enough, it will be forgotten.
Perhaps you are right, {TITLE}. Soon enough, another name will be on their lips, and this will be but a passing whisper.
You have learned that {HERO} and {TARGET} are {RELATION}.
{QUESTHERO} joins your party for a while.
{HERO.LINK} wants to spend some quality time with you, and joins you on your journey for a while.
{HERO.LINK} is very disappointed to be left alone and went back to {TOWN.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} enjoyed spending time with you and went back to {TOWN.LINK}.
Tell me, {TITLE}, would you like to join my party for a while?
These past days by your side have been a gift, {TITLE}, and I cherish every moment we have shared. Though we must part for now, I have no doubt our paths will cross again soon.
If you truly wish to make me yours, then you must seek {HERO}'s blessing. My heart is already yours, but it is their permission that will grant us the future we both desire.
Ask {QUESTHERO} for their hand in marriage.
{QUESTHERO} told you that you require the permission of {TARGET.LINK} in order to marry them.
{TITLE}, I humbly seek your blessing to take the hand of {HERO} in marriage.

You have shown yourself to be honorable and true, and I see the love {HERO} holds for you in her eyes. With that, I give my blessing. May your marriage be strong, your days joyful, and your hearts ever steadfast.
You speak admirably, but you are still yet unproven. Earn your place, show me your strength and honor, and then we shall speak of marriage.
You? Marry my daughter? A lowly wretch with little to offer? {HERO} is to wed someone of standing, not some starry-eyed fool who thinks love alone will keep a household.
Make sure your clan is tier 3+ and {HERO} likes you.
But {TITLE}, you know that I am already married...
